original_title: I segreti osceni di una vedova
overview: A fim that will leave you surprised... a very intriguing and engaging story that will make you spend truly unforgettable moments. A very particular family is about to compete for a huge fortune... whoever has the inheritance will be rich forever. Jessica Gayle... wife of the deceased is willing to do anything to have him... absolutely anything!!!
title: I segreti osceni di una vedova
